boat.name: Hope
boat.full_description:
'Hope' was designed and built in Govan on the Clyde by Jonny Burke in 2016. Jonny has a background in racing, and so good sailing performance is central in all his designs.

Since her launch in 2016, 'Hope' has cruised on Loch Tay, Derwentwater, Loch Morlich and Sound of Iona.

'Hope' has quite a wide beam and pretty lines so that alongside sailing capability she has space for all the family in a boat that catches the eye. 

LOA 16’9’ Beam 6’ 3” Draft 10” plate up 3’ plate down.
boat.construction_details: Quarter sawn Douglas fir, clinker planking on steamed oak frames. Copper fastened. Elm thwarts, bow and sternsheets.
boat.short_description: 'Hope' is a one-off clinker dinghy designed and built by Jonny Burke at Govan, Glasgow.
